string.text: Science Camp:\nWhat is it you want?
Science Camp:\nWait a moment, I am going to disable the security system.
Science Camp:\nDone, you may go.
Lone Wolf\nNow we can talk.

Toad:\nMesser, I heard that the military sent a group of soldiers towards Agroprom, most likely to get the documents you need to get me. Anyway, if you run into them, try to call someone for help on your PDA, that'll help distract some of the soldiers. That's all I can think of for now, and don't forget the box!
Message: Messer:\nHey you, stop!
Message:\nYou're on your own from here - we're not going in there with you, our orders are to hold this area.
Unknown sniper:\nWhere are you going, stalker?
Message:\nHey, he's shooting at our rats!
Message:\nOh, hey! Come on over and chat with me.
Major Kravtsov: Come in, let's talk. You'll find me at our base. I'm waiting.
Slug:\nUh, I don't get it, is he fucking dead?! Get over here!
Message:\nHey, you! Go to the building next to the water tower. I need to talk to you.
Incoming message:\nBro, come out! Come over here.

Toad:\nAttention, everyone! From now on, the stalker called Messer is declared a murderer! There is a bounty on his head - let him serve as another example of how not to treat a fellow stalker. He may still get a chance to atone for his sins, if, of course, he manages to get to me and talk things out.
Toad:\nHey, what are you doing?! You'll be declared a murderer if you intentionally kill another stalker - you won't be considered a stalker anymore, and you'll be hunted, so be aware of that.
Toad:\nHey, are you out of your mind?! These are my guys guarding my bunker!
Toad:\nMesser, what the fuck?! Is he dead?! Why the hell did I send you down there?! You still have amnesia, what am I gonna tell the troops?! Get over here!
PDA:\nAttention! Critical radiation levels detected! Check your suit for holes or leave the contaminated area immediately!

Toad:\nMesser, the soldiers have organized a raid on the bandits in the area where you are now, so don't run into them. A couple of hours ago an army jeep left the Cordon - there were 6 or 7 people inside it, and they were carrying some equipment with them. As soon as their mess subsides, see what was there, and you see if you can 'borrow' a car from the gentlemen in uniform. Anyway, if you find anything, I'll be in touch.
%c[255,160,160,160]Zyablikov:\n %c[255,245,118,54]Thanks for your help. I need to be alone.
Goiter:\nStalker, come here, I've got a job to do. I'm over here by the hillside.
Professor\nAlright, keep your eyes on the road to the bar. After the helicopter crosses paths with you, head toward the bunker.
%c[255,160,160,160] Barkeep:\n%c[255,160,160,160]What happened to the group? Damn it, Messer.\n
Dwarf:\nI want to ask you about something...

Lone Wolf:\nStalker, you've probably heard of the stalker bar by now, right? A place in the heart of the Zone, where stalkers gather after returning from distant raids. I can tell you that they're interested in you, but they're not waiting for you empty-handed. There's a house in the Dark Valley area, and the Barkeep is very interested in the documents that may be there..

Lone Wolf:\nThis loot will be your pass into the elite club, and you'll automatically move into the category of experienced stalkers. However, you can't get into the Valley for no reason - there is some kind of installation on its territory that generates waves of psionic radiation that drives people mad.

Lone Wolf:\nYou need a special protective device. The troopers went on a raid there recently, and it looks like they're all dead. I have information that a couple of soldiers made it out to the Garbage. I'm sure one of them has a protective device. They were seen at a crossing where a small creek runs off of it.
Lone Wolf:\nStalker, watch out, there's a pseudo-dog!
Lone Wolf:\nWait, don't go! Messer!

Lone Wolf:\nWell, here we are. The room is all yours. Make yourself comfortable. I think you should be able to get about seven or eight hours of sleep. The doors are only locked from the inside, and once the door is open, the compartment is considered unoccupied. You can't lock it from the outside, so everyone carries their own stuff. Also, you have to be ready to evacuate at a moment's notice if anything goes wrong. You get some sleep, and then we'll go to the bar, where we can drink, eat, and talk.
Lone Wolf:\nYou awake? Alright, time to move to the bar...
Lone Wolf:\nHey, Messer, wait!
Incoming message -\nSprout: Man, come with us! We got that bandit bastard that smoked seven of our guys in that house up on the hill, help us smack that bastard! Come here, I'll tell you more.
\nWhere's my gun, Messer?! What, you're keeping it for yourself? Well, I'll remember that, Messer!

Toad:\nMesser, come in. So here's the situation: I need to get something. It's called the Toad's Eye. It's located in the Garbage to the north. I sent a group there before, but they lost contact almost as soon as they got there. One of my defectors said that in the place where they saw the artifact there was no anomalous activity, but they were afraid to go there. So go to the Garbage and get me that artifact. I'll upload the coordinates of the Toad's Eye location to your PDA.

Toad:\nYeah, one more thing. That thing you shot stole one of my courier's documents while he was sleeping in the factory. He said it had some kind of lair on the roof. Maybe the creature took them there. Find them and bring them to me, as they have some value. Don't come back without them.
Toad:\nI don't get it, is he dead or something? What the hell were you looking at? I sent you to him. Go back to my bunker.

Toad:\nOh, I forgot to tell you something. In your PDA you have the ability to display the contact information of stalkers that are within a radius of about 250 meters from you. You can contact some of them from a distance. To do this, select the desired stalker in the contacts section. There you can also find out a brief description of this stalker. Try to reach Digger via PDA when you are near him. I think you'll get the gist of it.

Toad:\nYeah, one more thing - your PDA has a charge, and it loses that charge over time. Keep an eye on it so that you can keep your PDA working, and recharge it whenever you can. Your PDA is your lifeline in the Zone.
Toad:\nHow are you doing. Still alive?

Toad:\nMesser, there's something going on at the checkpoint after the emission. I can't get any signals from there, it's like there's no one there. Listen, why don't you go over there quietly and see what's going on? Once you figured out what happened, get the hell out of there and report back to me what you see.
Watchdog:\nHey, man, come here, we'll talk. Just help us deal with the pack first.
Watchdog:\nHow's that rookie doing? Is he feeling well?
Crow's Eye:\nHe's doing great! And he's no rookie either, if you'd seen the way he deftly took down the ringleader..
Watchdog:\nYes, he's no newbie. Come, we need to talk.
Duty:\nWatch out! There's a pseudo-dog! Somebody kill it! Hurry up! Stalker, kill that damned mutant!
Duty Leader:\nFighters, take your positions! The dead are coming. Messer, this is your chance to make your mark.
Duty Leader:\nGet ready, men! Another wave is coming!
Duty Leader:\nAttention! We are detecting strange interference in the air, everyone be careful.
Duty Leader\nOkay, we've got the rat. He's pushing our ammo to the left. Go to our merchant for your reward.
Incoming message:\nAh... critters...
Incoming message:\nIf you stay in the tower all night, something is bound to happen.
Incoming message:\nDamn it. I knew there was something wrong here. Okay, let's go to another place.

Incoming message -\nSergei: The group is dead, everyone here is dead... bloodsuckers! Damn it, what to do now? Thanks for coming with me, stalker. I owe you one. If you need me, look for me where I was or at the bar. I need a drink.
Incoming message:\nFucking door.

I've got a special order here. Bring anything weird you find. You never know what kind of surprise the Zone will spring on you next time. It's ten times the price for an unknown artifact. And hurry, you're not the only one trying to capitalize on this.

Hey, are you outside the Cordon now? I was told a strange artifact was seen in that area. Bring anything strange you find. You never know what kind of surprise the Zone will give you next time. There's a tenfold fee for this unknown artifact. And hurry, you're not the only one looking for it.
There's information about a special artifact in the area where you are. Bring anything weird you find. You never know what surprise the Zone will give you next time.
Message:\nHmm, looks like a source of the contagion...
Message:\nHmm, looks like a source of the contagion...
Message:\nMesser, this is the leader of the Duty faction. I'm waiting for you at my place, we need to talk.
Major:\nHello, Rat, trying to do your business behind my back?
Rat:\nHello, Major. I was acting solely on your instructions.
Rat:\nLeave us two alone.
Rat:\nDo I have to repeat myself?

Toad:\nMesser, I heard that the military sent a group towards Agroprom, most likely sent to get the documents you need to get me. Anyway, if you run into them, try to call someone for help on your PDA, at least it'll distract some of them. That's it. And don't forget the box!
Message: Messer:\nHey you, stop!
Message:\nYou're on your own from here - we're not going in there with you, our orders are to hold this area.
Unknown sniper:\nWhere are you going, stalker?
Message:\nHey, he's shooting at our rats!
Message:\nOh, hey! Come on over and talk to me.
Major Kravtsov:\nCome in, let's talk. You'll find me at our base. I'm waiting.
Slug:\nUh, I don't get it, is he fucking dead?! Get over here!
Message:\nHey, you! Go to the building next to the water tower. I need to talk to you.
Incoming Message:\nBro, come out! Come down.

Toad:\nAttention, everyone! From now on, the stalker called Messer is declared a murderer! There is a bounty on his head - let him serve as another example of how not to treat a fellow stalker. He may still get a chance to atone for his sins, if, of course, he gets to me and talk things out with me.

Toad:\nHey, what are you doing?! You'll be declared a murderer if you kill one more neutral stalker. Through your own fault, you'll be out of the Stalkers' way, and you'll be hunted, so be aware of that.
Toad:\nHey, are you out of your mind?! These are my guys! They're guarding my bunker!
Toad:\nMesser, what the fuck?! Is he dead?! Why the hell did I send you down there?! You still have amnesia, what am I gonna tell the troops?! Get over here!
PDA:\nAttention! Critical radiation contamination detected! Check your suit for leaks or leave the contaminated area immediately!

Toad:\nMesser, the soldiers have organized a raid on the bandits in the area where you are now, so don't run into them. A couple of hours ago an army jeep left the Cordon - there were 6 or 7 soldiers - and they were carrying some equipment with them. As soon as this mess is over, see what was there, and you can 'borrow' a car from the gentlemen in uniform. Anyway, if you find anything, I'll be in touch.
Incoming message - Max:\nIt's working! Let's run to the hall and see what's going on!
Incoming message - Max:\nThe light is on, my friend, the light is on!
Incoming message - Max:\nThis is it! This is what I was talking about!
Incoming message - Max:\nYes, I'm coming to you.
Message:\nShit, there's someone out there, everybody be on the lookout!
Message: Group\nEveryone group up! Remember, our goal now is to get to the tunnel leading to Rostok.
Message: Leader\nOkay, it's quiet. Come stalker, we'll discuss what to do next...
Message: Leader\nKeep quiet... Everyone check your guns...
Message: Leader\nThere's something there...
Message: Black Slug\nHalt! Let's take the bastards down! Whoa... who are these guys?
Message: Black Slug\nOkay, put the guns away, guys. This is just an ID check. You try to run, you're gonna get shot, I'm telling you.
Message: Black Slug\nWhat the hell?! Nail, go check it out. We're holding these ones, don't piss--
Message: Black Slug\nThere's nothing here! Let's go get these guys and get the fuck outta here!
Message: Black Slug\nYou! Get your backpack off!
Message: Black Slug\nFuck! Get the fuck away!
Message: Leader\nMesser! Get out of here, let's go!
Message: Leader\nMesser! Follow me, let's get out of here, hurry up! What the hell is this place!? That thing dragged you down here before I could get here!
Message: Leader\nIt's quiet. Shit. Go to the bar and talk to the Barkeep about what happened. I'm not going with you, I have some things I need to take care of... Go!
Chrome:\nI think I got a signal. Wait a bit, our guys will give them a warm welcome. If you can, do us a favor and help our guys. I don't think they'll know who attacked them in the dark.
Freedomer:\nQuiet, boys. Let's try to get in quietly...
Message: Monolith\nStalker, get out of here... this is none of your business.
Message:\nHey, stalker! Bro, come here, I have something to do!
Message:\nThis password expired on 20.02.2012. Please enter a new password.
Messer:\nFuck... Fucking Slug...
Message:\nUh, hey you, bro, you come over here, around the corner.
Message: Jackal\nMesser, turn on your PDA and find me through the Contacts tab. I'll tell you what's going on...
Message:\nConnection lost.
